entities.description: The act of intentionally setting fire to property.
The practice of obtaining something, especially money, through force or threats.
The unlawful entry into a building with intent to commit a crime, especially theft.
Stealing items from inside a motor vehicle.
The act of stealing or attempting to steal a motor vehicle.
The act of making an imitation of currency, documents, or goods with the intent to deceive or defraud.
The act of illegally using state welfare systems by knowingly withholding information or giving false information.
The act of damaging or vandalizing property.
The illegal possession, distribution, or manufacture of drugs or narcotics.
The possession, distribution, or manufacture of equipment used for drug-related activities.
The act of engaging in sexual activity for payment.
The illegal trade of humans for the purposes of forced labor, sexual slavery, or commercial sexual exploitation.

relationships.description: Indicates involvement in the crime of arson.
Indicates involvement in the crime of extortion.
Indicates involvement in the crime of burglary.
Indicates involvement in the crime of theft from a motor vehicle.
Indicates involvement in the crime of motor vehicle theft.
Indicates involvement in the crime of counterfeiting.
Indicates involvement in the crime of welfare fraud.
Indicates involvement in the crime of destruction of property.
Indicates involvement in the crime of drug violation.
Indicates involvement in the crime of drug equipment violation.
Indicates involvement in the crime of prostitution.
Indicates involvement in the crime of human trafficking.
